pages.title: Dissolve
pages.text: $(bold)COST: $(spell) + $(#c7a734)Clock$()$(br2)$(bold)MAX LEVEL:$() $(#green)1$() $(br2)$(bold)XP COST:$() $(#green)8$()$(br2)$(italic)''An easy spell to make and use. When striking an entity with the projectile, it will clear them of all status effects.''$()

When casting $(#148c50)$(bold)Dissolve$(), a projectile will be thrown from your scroll, upon striking another entity, it will clear all effects from them, good or bad. $(br2)$(#148c50)$(bold)Dissolve$() could easily have combat practicality since you could remove buffs from your ennemies or debuffs from your allies. $(br2)$(bold)Tip: $(italic)The scroll is a one-time use.$()
